alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 4:11PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN FRANKLIN...CENTRAL CRAWFORD AND NORTHERN SEBASTIAN COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM CDT... At 411 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles northeast of Lee Creek to 4 miles south of Fern. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Cedarville... Mountainburg... Alma... Mulberry... Dyer... Chester... Rudy... Lake Fort Smith... Figure Five... Lee Creek... Fern... Concord... Piney... Toney... Locke... Cecil... Furry... Lonelm... Cravens... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 9 and 30. Interstate 49 between mile markers 22 and 37. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
